original_text: For they would come up with their livestock and their tents; they would come like locusts in number—both they and their camels could not be counted—so that they laid waste the land as they came in.
korean_text: 이는 그들이 그들의 짐승과 장막을 가지고 올라와 메뚜기 떼 같이 많이 들어오니 그 사람과 낙타가 무수함이라 그들이 그 땅에 들어와 멸하려 하니

sentences.original_text: For they would come up with their livestock
they would come like locusts in number
both they and their camels could not be counted
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 그들의 낙타는 셀 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: so that they laid waste the land
